content: Now drop down from the body to reach a lower level, where right away you'll be presented with two paths: To the right is a rock bridge lined with a few stone lanterns that leads to the heart of the Lower Hollow, and the main boss. However, there's also a ledge to drop down on the left, which will take you to an optional and lucrative area across a rope bridge, and it helpfully loops back around to drop you back off at this spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cliff of Oblivion'.
The content is as follows:
Now drop down from the body to reach a lower level, where right away you'll be presented with two paths: To the right is a rock bridge lined with a few stone lanterns that leads to the heart of the Lower Hollow, and the main boss. However, there's also a ledge to drop down on the left, which will take you to an optional and lucrative area across a rope bridge, and it helpfully loops back around to drop you back off at this spot.
